text: Ezɨ atrivir Jordanɨn Fanemɨn aruem uaghiri naghɨn itiba, me mɨghsɨabar itir danganibar atriviba ko, mɨghsɨar dozibar itir danganibar atriviba ko, danganir Mediterenianɨn Ongarir Ekiamɨn mɨriamɨn ikegha ghua notɨn amadaghan Lebanonɨn nguazimɨn tuzir atriviba. Me kara: Hitian atrivim, Amorian atrivim, Kenanian atrivim, Peresian atrivim, Hivian atrivim ko Jebusian atrivim, me bar moghɨra Israelia amizir bizir kabar akam baraki.
